RegionParam.name: region
RegionParam.description: Filters results based on the specified region

StaleParam.name: stale
StaleParam.description: If present, results will include stale reads

PrefixParam.name: prefix
PrefixParam.description: Constrains results to jobs that start with the defined prefix

NamespaceParam.name: namespace
NamespaceParam.description: Filters results based on the specified namespace

PerPageParam.name: per_page
PerPageParam.description: maximum number of results to return

NextTokenParam.name: next_token
NextTokenParam.description: Indicates where to start paging for queries that support pagination
